mapper.update: update etms_user set user_name = #{userName}, dept_id = #{deptId},user_position = #{userPosition},user_telephone = #{userTelephone}, user_email = #{userEmail},user_manager = #{userManager},user_role = #{userRole}, user_company = #{userCompany},user_head_img = #{userHeadImg},updated_by = #{updatedBy}, updated_time = #{updatedTime} where user_id = #{userId}
